snippet.title: Cupid - Play as a cute little Cupid in this logic puzzle game made for the Game Boy Color!
snippet.description:
Play for free on itch.io https://gumpyfunction.itch.io/cupid?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt CUPID is a logic puzzle game made for the Game Boy Color.  

Something or someone has broken the Heart, a magical relic that stitches all things together. Without it, the universe will slowly unravel and everything will fall into darkness. Play as a cute little Cupid, tasked with mending the broken Heart. Do your best to spread love and happiness to all that you meet and prevent the darkness from taking hold!

➡️ More from GumpyFunction https://gumpyfunction.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More puzzle games https://itch.io/games/genre-puzzle?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames
